* can collaborate on a group library
* storage capacity is based on the plan of the owner of the group. a lab PI, for example, could purchase the $120/year unlimited data plan and share that with the lab members under a lab group
* can create a public group that anyone can join. is also a good way to share your lab's publications with the world in an easily-downloadable format
* can create a private group that requires an invitation to join
